oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Out of Uniform Permission Slip
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Central High School; schools; ROTC; 1920s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Permission slip for Walter Streuli to be out of uniform on February 18, 1922, signed by H.P. Bears.
